lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh kicker Jeff Reed has been cited for disorderly conduct and criminal mischief after the Pennsylvania state police said he threw a tantrum at a convenience store because its restroom did not have towels. The police said Reed broke the towel dispenser, then used profane language to an employee. Each offense carries a maximum fine of $300 and 90 days in jail.
